title: Cursor problems
body: Whenever I try to cast a spell I cant adjust the cursor at all as soon as I press Q w e or r and my cursor freezes until the spell is cast so I have to position the spell before I hit the button not allowing me to adjust

replies.body:
Aha, gotcha!  In that case, your config may be acting up.  Resetting your config should help!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that works for you.
Hmm, it sounds like this could be an issue with your config but I've also heard of cases like this for Macs.  To get some more info, are you on a Mac?
